channel.title: Help on server
channel.description: hello, i'm kinda new to this but i got a question i'm looking for a source with less edit (i wanne start with only the basics) could som1 tell me a good source

item.title: Help on server
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:

[quote=“Girona, post:10, topic:276409”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=365039.msg2769455#msg2769455 date=1241034308]
Or how about 317Serv…?
[/quote]

Moparisthebest Nothing, or nothing you can see... Davidude Nothing, or nothing you can see... srt8 Nothing, or nothing you can see...
Just hope they aren’t banning you for no reason
By the way, kind of scary isn’t it :|[/quote]

What…?

item.title: Help on server
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

Sorry I could only get a short list and not post the links, it’s kind of hard to find when I got other stuff to do, and it is hard to find a decent server to work with, most people just post server downloads with more added useless and unwanted junk in the server causing lag, so I would recommend you use one of the basic, stable nice&neat sources.

Read full topic

item.title: Help on server
item.dc:creator: @vosenschaap vosenschaap
item.description:
@vosenschaap wrote:

[quote=“Girona, post:6, topic:276409”][quote author=vosenschaap link=topic=365039.msg2769325#msg2769325 date=1241030404]

[quote author=Girona link=topic=365039.msg2769316#msg2769316 date=1241030110]

i would say alstarscape
it was my first source and im still using it
[/quote]Gross, very unstable, too many glitches, unwanted crap inside the source.

then wot would u recomond plz?
[/quote]Well, I have nothing agaisnt TestScape, a bit stable, nice to work with for beginners, but I will give a list of what I think would be good.

#1 TestScape
#2 PimpScape
#3 Project-Czar

TestScape
Stable, nice to work with, good for beginners, also beside nice to work with, it’s easy to work with too.

PimpScape
Well, this one here does have alot of useless junk but it will be easy to clear, and you got a nice stable server to work with

Project-Czar
Hmm, this one is real messy, alot of unwanted crap, but it is mostly used by all of the MoparScape members.
Just clean it up a bit, fix some stuff, it will be ok. It might take a while to clean up though, I will suggest some good tutorials on clearing out some lag in PM if you would like.[/quote]
ty alot i’m going for the testscape been a while but ill pick it up fast i hope trieng to get a noclip for owner now. Ill work it out

Read full topic

Stable, nice to work with, good for beginners, also beside nice to work with, it’s easy to work with too.

Well, this one here does have alot of useless junk but it will be easy to clear, and you got a nice stable server to work with

Project-Czar
Hmm, this one is real messy, alot of unwanted crap, but it is mostly used by all of the MoparScape members.
Just clean it up a bit, fix some stuff, it will be ok. It might take a while to clean up though, I will suggest some good tutorials on clearing out some lag in PM if you would like.
